name: The Burrow
description:
A short game about exploring an immense burrow as a shinny worm.

Made in 72h for the LudumDare 38, The theme was "Small World".

Programming : Stending
Art : Tori
Music : Pierre Vanier

(The game isn't optimized at all and the files are really big (~400mo).
We'll realease an optimized and lighter version soon!)
